node.title: Elon Musk says he'll donate billions to fight world hunger, but only if a UN agency meets his conditions
node.alt: Multi-billionaire Elon Musk has a diagnosis of Aspergers
node.description: Elon Musk, the world's richest person, says he will donate $US6 billion to the UN's initiative to address world hunger if the global body can meet his terms around transparency and accounting.
node.content:
["Elon Musk, the world's richest person, says he will donate $US6\u00a0billion ($8\u00a0billion) to the UN's initiative to address world hunger if the global body can meet\u00a0his terms.", "The head of the UN's World Food Programme (WFP), David Beasley, has been campaigning for the world's wealthiest people to donate on a \"one-time basis\" to\u00a0address dire food shortages affecting tens of millions of\u00a0people.", "In an interview with CNN, Mr Beasley said the world's billionaires could give a combined \u201d$6 billion to help 42 million people that are literally going to die if we don't reach them\".", "\u201cIt's not complicated,\u201d he said.", "Mr Musk, the owner of Tesla and SpaceX,\u00a0responded to the call, albeit with some scepticism.", "He said if WFP could detail exactly how that amount of money\u00a0would \"solve world hunger\" \u2014 a phase he borrowed from a CNN headline paraphrasing Mr Beasley\u00a0\u2014\u00a0he would make the donation.", "\"It must be open source accounting, so the public sees precisely how the money is spent.\"", "Mr Musk's net worth is estimated by Forbes to be more than $US315 billion ($420 billion), a number that has grown dramatically in recent weeks due in part to the soaring price of the Tesla shares he owns.", "Mr Beasley said he never claimed the donation would solve world hunger \u2014 blaming the \"inaccurate\" headline on CNN for the misunderstanding \u2014 but that it would \"prevent geopolitical instability, mass migration and save 42 million people on the brink of starvation\".", "Mr Beasley made an offer to show Mr Musk \"the plan, and open books\" if he\u00a0agreed to a meeting.", "", "
The World Food Programme's primary mission is to address hunger and famine.(AP Photo/Ben Curtis)
", "The World Food Programme won the 2020 Nobel Peace Prize for its efforts to end world hunger, particularly by countering the use of hunger as a weapon of war.", "WFP's website says it urgently needs $US6.6 billion ($8.8\u00a0billion) in order to implement its \"expertise, deep-field presence and operational scale to stop famine in its tracks, and steer people away from the edge of starvation\".", "The organisation lists conflict as one of the biggest causes of global famine, and names Yemen, South Sudan, Nigeria and Afghanistan as some of the countries most likely to be affected.", "", "
The World Food Programme was awarded 2020 Nobel Peace Prize
", "It says it addresses famine\u00a0through emergency food assistance, rapid responses, and longer-term strategies.", "In 2020, the agency received $US8.4 billion ($11.2 billion) in donations, which it says was $US5.3\u00a0billion ($7.1\u00a0billion) short of its requirements.", "A 2020\u00a0internal audit of WFP's management of contributions or donations found it\u00a0was \"partially satisfactory\"\u00a0but in need of some improvement.", "ABC/AP"]
